scripts.dev: concurrently "json-server -p 3001 db.json" "tailwindcss -i frontend/src/input.css -o frontend/src/output.css --watch" "cd ./backend && ts-node-dev index.ts" "cd ./frontend && vite"
scripts.build:frontend: tailwindcss -i frontend/src/input.css -o frontend/src/output.css && cd ./frontend && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.build:frontend:test: tailwindcss -i frontend/src/input.css -o frontend/src/output.css && cd ./frontend && tsc -b && vite build --mode development
scripts.build: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.build:test: pnpm run build:frontend:test && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.test:extensive: pnpm run build:test && pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:e2e-full
